text: The Football Association of Finland (, SPL; , FBF) is the governing body of football in Finland. The SPL was founded on 19 May 1907. The association organizes the Finland national football team for men and women and the national futsal team. It is based in the Finnish capital Helsinki. title: Football Association of Finland
